How peaceful “are” the Aztecs? Surely you mean were? What degree of peace? Warfare was part of native american life, from the Iroquois of the East Coast, USA, to the Guarani of South Brasil. The Aztecs, especially, thrived in capturing enemy combatants - it was even how you got promoted to Jaguar and Eagle - and exerced power over neighbors with might.
